DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial determine cost effective programme overweight obese individual maintain weight loss 2 year period .
DOC.brief_title: The Heat Study : 2 Year Lifestyle Intervention Overweight Women Encourage Weight Management
DOC.detailed_description: Although short term weight loss often achievable overweight individual , long term maintenance generally poor . The researcher urgently need new information regard cost effective programme ( ) maintenance weight loss . This study recruit 200 woman compare two approach provide support : one intensive health professional support , peer group support facilitate research nurse frequent 'weigh- in ' . The researcher also compare two different diet one high carbohydrate , high fibre , low glycaemic index diet versus one relatively high monounsaturated fat protein low glycaemic load .
DOC.criteria: Female participant Aged 25 70 Those intentionally lose equal 5 % initial body weight previous 6 month recruit Objective evidence volunteer overweight obese lose weight obtain doctor record Presence major illness include cancer Established cardiovascular disease stroke Diabetes Gestational diabetes Renal disease Malabsorption disorder Thyroid disorder Major psychiatric disorder Taking weight loss medication medication know cause weight gain Planning pregnancy next 2 year Those intend area next 2 year
